## About

Prof. Geir Selbæk is a leading researcher in aging and dementia at the Norwegian National Advisory Unit on Ageing and Health. His research focuses on understanding the relationship between lifestyle factors and dementia risk. He is also a professor of geriatric medicine at the University of Oslo.

## Research Interests

- Lifestyle interventions in dementia
- Risk factors for AD
- Prevention strategies
- Clinical epidemiology
